verses.roman:
prati vṛkṣa-latā prabhu karena āliṅgana
puṣpādi dhyāne karena kṛṣṇe samarpaṇa

synonyms: prati—each and every; vṛkṣa-latā—tree and creeper; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena āliṅgana—embraced; puṣpa-ādi—all the flowers and fruits; dhyāne—in meditation; karena—do; kṛṣṇe—unto Lord Kṛṣṇa; samarpaṇa—offering.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu began to embrace each and every tree and creeper, and they began to offer their fruits and flowers as if in meditation.
